about_the_game:
TIC-TAC: Twelve o'clock game is inspired by cult horrors of the early '90s. You have to help a group of schoolchildren-adventurers solves the abandoned school's dark mystery.

STORYLINE

You`ll spend a few nights in the oppressive atmosphere of the gloomy deserted corridors and classrooms. Carefully monitor the safety of your shelter, solving puzzles and responding to the challenge of otherworldly forces. Counter your wit and haste with frightening surprises. And finally, try to find out what caused the transformation of an ordinary school in a quiet small town into a realm of cruelty, pain, and suffering.

Together with four friends, you`ll go on an exciting elaborate story. You can choose a strategy to fight the otherworldly inhabitants of the darkness of abandoned classes. Your vigilance and attentiveness will be tested by unexpected challenges of the original game mechanic and sudden attacks of creepy creatures. And for every night you survive you`ll be rewarded with story advancement and new challenges.

FEATURES

  • Original plot.
  • Gloomy atmosphere of isolation.
  • Dynamic gameplay with hard timings.
  • Puzzles and random events.
  • Detailed style of a retro horror.


Are you ready to challenge evil when 12 o'clock strikes?

name: TIC-TAC: Twelve o'clock

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: TIC-TAC: Twelve o'clock is a single adventure-puzzle game with a storyline that runs through survival horror in the Bluebird Middle school. You must spend several nights in an abandoned building, trying to find out whats going on, and protect your life.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Japanese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
